article.title: Thales Raytheon Awarded Identification Friend or Foe Funds
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Thales Raytheon Systems Co., LLC, Fullerton, Calif., was awarded a $23,147,096 modification, to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract to procure Sentinel Mode 5 Identification Friend or Foe kits and spares. The total cumulative face value of the contract is $30,442,096. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
